code: var ENDPOINT='http://localhost:4003/db/login';export default function LoginService(_ref){var username=_ref.username,password=_ref.password;return fetch("".concat(ENDPOINT),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({username:username,password:password})}).then(function(res){if(!res.ok){console.log({res:res});throw new Error("Response is not ok");}return res.json();}).then(function(res){var jwt=res.token;return jwt;});}
